title: Resident Activities, Spa/Hot Tub, Vertical Blinds, Balcony/Patio
posting_body: ['t Reno Villas, we know the value of our location.', "As an exciting and bustling city, it's not difficult to see why people are falling in love with Las Vegas.", "You'll certainly love your home in Las Vegas, with plenty of access to amenities and entertainment.", 'Our balconies look out onto the city lights, and our BBQ Grills and Picnic areas are perfect for warm Saturdays.', 'Cool off in our swimming pool, and then soak up the warm Nevada sun.', "You'll love staying home in Reno Villas.", 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 600 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- All Electric Kitchen', '- Breakfast Bar', '- Vertical Blinds', '- Balcony/Patio', '- Air Conditioning', '- Fully Equipped Kitchen', 'Community Amenities', '- Spa/Hot Tub', '- Dog Park', '- BBQ and Picnic Areas', '- Resident Activities', '- Laundry Facilities', '- On Site Maintenance Team', '- Beautiful Landscaping', '- On Call Maintenance', '- Covered Parking', '- Swimming Pool', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet-enthusiastic property', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Reno Villas', '5055 Jeffreys St, Las Vegas, NV, 89119', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'wBmjqgdik7']
